answers.answer: I only got one at 20 weeks and that was it

It depends on every doctor. I only got 2 so far and won't get anymore, I got one at my first appointment at 11 weeks and then my gender scan at 20 weeks. Haven't had one since then, and I'll be 37 weeks tomorrow.
Lissaleigh i know i dont undestand im a FTM and i wanna see my baby i havnt seen her so i get sort of sad but as long as she is healthy im happy but just a peek wont hurt
omg juniorsmommy3x i have gotten 5 in my whole 27 weej journey but still its not a recent one.
I'd be happy with the 5 lol but unfortunately 2 is all I got. I gotta wait till birth to see my little man again!
Depends on dr, insurance, and if you are high risk from all that I have seen and heard. I'm 35 weeks and have had 2. And one was just cause they thought something was wrong from my blood work.
I got two for my first and second pregnancy and would have for this one but I'm high risk now so I get one every week.
Ive had 2 so far... but I'll get another one when I do my diabetes test at 28 weeks, I'll be 22 weeks tomorrow. :)
OMG ladies so im lucky i got this many then, ugh but its never enough
You are lucky I get one every two weeks but that is because im high risk so everytime i go to the doctor i get to see my baby but I also go in worried that something maybe wrong
Im 25 wks and have 1 tomorrow which in total would be 4 .. Yay i get to see my baby girl tomorrow :)

I've had 6 now I'm 30 weeks as of today. Healthy pregnancy. We do have a referral put in to get another soon. My doctor did a quick peek at our little girl and the fluid was quite a bit low so hopefully it goes back up by then.

Normally u get 3 total. One at 12 weeks, one between 20-24 and I was told I get one more toward the end of the pregnancy. I am 23 weeks right now. I am just going to pay to get an extra one so we can see our baby boy in those 3d ultrasound ones.
I wanna get a 3d ultrasound but alot of people claim its not worth it.
I've had 4 and I'm 24 weeks. My last one was my gender scan though. I wanna see my boy every time I'm at the doctors lol. But, listening to his heart beat is just as lovely:)

Depends on your doc and your pregnancy. If you're considered high risk, you'll get them more often..if not, most only do 2-3. We had the initial scan at 11weeks, the gender scan at 18 weeks and a final one at 35 weeks. I had one more a weight and measure bc I was losing weight instead of gaining any. So it depends, but you may get one more or none at all until your lil one is born
Ultra sounds aren't super good for baby so thats why they don't do them real often
yeah i've only had the dating scan at 7+6 and nuchal at 12+6 and then my gender/ anatony scan at 19+3 wks. i'm 24+1 now and been told i have no more :(

I've had about 8! They thought something was wrong with my little guy but nope he's prefect! I've only got 10 days to go!!! Getting the membrane sweep tomorrow hopefully that sets things in motion! Btw I'm a ftm! Whoop!

question: So i have a question for you ladies, i am 27 weeks and my last sonogram was a month and a half so when is my next follow up?! The doctor she is healthy and they dont usually do them all the time, my next test will be may 10th but its only for the diabetes test. Will the give a sonogram i want to see how big my baby girl is, help!! I need to know!
title: Next sonogram?!
